name: Sly Short-Sighted Snowmen
description:
Collect all the christmas presents while avoiding the ever-growing presence of evil snowmen who want to devour you.

Credits:
Daniel Cohen (Design, Code, 3D Models) - https://twitter.com/faemir
Matt Blickem (Design, Code) - https://twitter.com/mattblickem

Made for Ludum Dare 31 in December 2014
